Class TranslationDirectoryBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.siroshun09.translationloader.directory.TranslationDirectoryBuilder
  • public final class TranslationDirectoryBuilder
extends Object
    A builder class to create TranslationDirectory.

        @Contract("_ -> this")
@NotNull
public @NotNull TranslationDirectoryBuilder setVersion​(@NotNull
                                                       @NotNull String version)
        Sets the translation version.

        If this version differs from the version of the loaded TranslationLoader, add the missing messages using TranslationLoaderCreator.

        Parameters:
        version - the translation version
        Returns:
        this builder

      • build

        @Contract(value="-> new",
          pure=true)
@NotNull
public @NotNull TranslationDirectory build()
        Creates a new TranslationDirectory.
        Returns:
        a new TranslationDirectory
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - the directory is not set by setDirectory(Path)
        NullPointerException - the registry supplier is not set by setRegistrySupplier(Supplier) or could not be created
